00049                 static private void onQuit(System.Object sender, System.EventArgs e)
00050                 {
00051                         Application.Exit();
00052                 }
00053 
00057                 static private void onPlay(System.Object sender, System.EventArgs e)
00058                 {
00059                         if (Player.Instance.isPlaying) Player.Instance.mediaChangeIntended = true;
00060                         Media tmp = Playlist.Instance[Playlist.Instance.Cursor];
00061 
00062                         try
00063                         {
00064                                 Player.Instance.stop();
00065                                 Player.Instance.open(ref tmp);
00066                                 Player.Instance.play();
00067                         }
00068                         catch (WebException)
00069                         {
00070                                 MessageBox.Show("The server has locked the file. Please try again later.", "WebException", MessageBoxButtons.OK, MessageBoxIcon.Warning);
00071                         }
00072                         catch (InvalidOperationException)
00073                         {
00074                                 onPlay(sender, e);
00075                         }
00076                 }
00077 
00081                 static private void onNext(System.Object sender, System.EventArgs e)
00082                 {
00083                         Playlist.Instance.Cursor = Playlist.Instance.next();
00084                         onPlay(sender, e);
00085                 }
00086 
00090                 static private void onPrev(object sender, EventArgs e)
00091                 {
00092                         Playlist.Instance.Cursor = Playlist.Instance.prev();
00093                         onPlay(sender, e);
00094                 }
00095 
00099                 static private void onStop(object sender, EventArgs e)
00100                 {
00101                         Player.Instance.stop();
00102                 }
00103 
00107                 static private void onPause(object sender, EventArgs e)
00108                 {
00109                         Player.Instance.togglePause();
00110                 }
00111 
00115                 [STAThread]

00119                         //bIs64Bit = (IntPtr.Size == 8);
00120 
00124                         if (Crossfade.Properties.Settings.Default.MusicFolder == "default")
00125                         {
00126                                 MusicPath = Environment.GetFolderPath(Environment.SpecialFolder.MyMusic);
00127                         }
00128                         else
00129                         {
00130                                 MusicPath = Crossfade.Properties.Settings.Default.MusicFolder;
00131                         }
00132 
00138                         /*if (!File.Exists("fmodex32.dll") ||
00139                                 !File.Exists("fmodex64.dll")) throw new FileNotFoundException("fmodex32/64.dll not found!");
00140 
00141                         if (File.Exists("fmodex.dll")) File.Delete("fmodex.dll");
00142 
00143                         if (bIs64Bit)
00144                                 File.Copy("fmodex64.dll", "fmodex.dll");
00145                         else
00146                                 File.Copy("fmodex32.dll", "fmodex.dll");*/
00147 
00148                         Application.EnableVisualStyles();
00149                         Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault(false);
00150 
00154                         NotifyIcon trayicon = new NotifyIcon();
00155                         trayicon.Text = "CrossFade";
00156                         trayicon.Icon = Crossfade.Properties.Resources.systray;
00157                         trayicon.Visible = true;
00158                         trayicon.DoubleClick += new EventHandler(trayicon_DoubleClick);
00159 
00160                         ContextMenu ctxmenu = new ContextMenu();
00161 
00162                         ctxmenu.MenuItems.Add(new MenuItem("&Play", new EventHandler(onPlay)));
00163                         ctxmenu.MenuItems.Add(new MenuItem("&Stop", new EventHandler(onStop)));
00164                         ctxmenu.MenuItems.Add(new MenuItem("&Pause", new EventHandler(onPause)));
00165                         ctxmenu.MenuItems.Add(new MenuItem("&Previous", new EventHandler(onPrev)));
00166                         ctxmenu.MenuItems.Add(new MenuItem("&Next", new EventHandler(onNext)));
00167                         ctxmenu.MenuItems.Add(new MenuItem("&Quit", new EventHandler(onQuit)));
00168                         trayicon.ContextMenu = ctxmenu;
00169 
00173                         gui_SplashScreen.ShowSplashScreen();
00174 
00175                         // Create AppDomainSetup
00176                         //string exeAssembly = Assembly.GetEntryAssembly().FullName;
00177 
00178                         //AppDomainSetup ads = new AppDomainSetup();
00179                         //ads.ApplicationBase = System.Environment.CurrentDirectory;
00180                         //ads.DisallowBindingRedirects = false;
00181                         //ads.DisallowCodeDownload = true;
00182                         //ads.ConfigurationFile = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.SetupInformation.ConfigurationFile;
00183 
00185                         //Evidence secInfo = new Evidence();

00187                         //Evidence secInfo = null;
00188 
00190                         //AppDomain ad = AppDomain.CreateDomain("Webserver", secInfo, ads);

00192                         //serv.Start(MusicPath);
00193 
00194                         serv = null;
00195                         try
00196                         {
00197                                 gui_SplashScreen.SetProgressBar(5);
00198 
00202                                 gui_SplashScreen.SetStatus("Creating player ...");
00203                                 Player.Instance.bootstrap();
00204                                 gui_SplashScreen.SetProgressBar(50);
00205 
00209                                 gui_SplashScreen.SetStatus("Creating media library ...");
00210                                 MediaDB.Instance.bootstrap();
00211                                 MediaDB.Instance.commit();
00212                                 gui_SplashScreen.SetProgressBar(50);
00213 
00217                                 gui_SplashScreen.SetStatus("Creating playlist ...");
00218                                 Playlist.Instance.bootstrap();
00219                                 gui_SplashScreen.SetProgressBar(50);
00220 
00224                                 gui_SplashScreen.SetStatus("Loading GUI ...");
00225                                 gui = (IGUI)(new gui_krypton());
00226                                 gui_SplashScreen.SetProgressBar(50);
00227 
00231                                 gui_SplashScreen.SetStatus("Creating Peer2Peer-Service ...");
00232                                 serv = new HTTPServer();
00233                                 serv.Start(MusicPath);
00234                                 P2PDB.Instance.start();
00235                                 gui_SplashScreen.SetProgressBar(-1);
00236 
00237                                 Application.Run((Form)gui);
00238                         }
00239                         finally
00240                         {
00241                                 P2PDB.Instance.stop();
00242                                 if (serv != null) serv.Stop();
00243                                 //AppDomain.Unload(ad);
00244                         }
00245                 }
